column1: The Pit Room////If you love barbeque then you should most definitely come to The Pit Room! I had been craving bbq for weeks and when in Texas you get bbq. Yelp steered me and my friend here because everything looks awesome from the photos.  I'm here to tell you it's absolutely awesome!!  I got a beef rib that was enormous and cooked to perfection. The smoked turkey was literally the best I have ever had. The sausages are so flavorful if not a tad bit over spiced. And I mean a tad bit. They were really good.  My friend also got the pulled pork and the brisket. She found the pulled pork a little sweet for her taste but not bad at all.  The best items of the meal were the beef rib and the smoked turkey.
